name: Lake Of Roaches
description: Very short and awful thing done for the 7-day Fishing Jam at jam.legendaryfisher.com. Pay a visit to the Lake of Roaches. Disgusting, I hear you say... Repulsive... Juvenile! What kind of person would upload a game like this?! He's devaluing the medium! Get him outta here! I think I'm going to be sick! Help! 2 phenomenal endings.
